# <a name="fix-outlook-on-the-web-sync-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dacd-102">Oprava Outlooku na webe problémy so synchronizáciou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-102">Fix Outlook on the web sync issues</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dacd-103">Outlook na webe zobrazuje mobilné zariadenia, ktoré používate na pripojenie k poštovej schránke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-103">Outlook on the web shows the mobile devices you use to connect to your mailbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dacd-104">Ak už nepoužívate zariadenie alebo zariadenie nie je správne synchronizované, môžete ho odstrániť z tohto zoznamu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-104">If you're no longer using a device or a device isn't syncing properly, you can delete it from this list.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="4dacd-105">Vybrať</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-105">Choose</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="4dacd-106">**Nastavenia**  >  **Zobrazenie všetkých nastavení**  >  Outlooku **Všeobecné**  >  **Mobilné zariadenia**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-106">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Mobile devices**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4dacd-107">Premiestnite kurzor nad zariadením v zozname a potom vyberte ikonu koša</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-107">Move the cursor over your device in the list, and then select the trash icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="4dacd-108">Ak chcete odstrániť partnerstvo zariadenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-108">to delete the device partnership.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4dacd-109">V hornej časti okna vyberte položku **Uložiť**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-109">At the top of the window, select **Save**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4dacd-110">Prejdite do svojho mobilného zariadenia a vypnite ho úplne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-110">Go to your mobile device and power it off completely.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4dacd-111">Po niekoľkých sekundách reštartujte mobilné zariadenie a potom znova synchronizujte svoju poštovú schránku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-111">Restart your mobile device after a few seconds, and then sync your mailbox again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dacd-112">Ďalšie informácie nájdete v téme [Riešenie problémov so synchronizáciou e-mailov alebo odstránenie zariadenia z Outlooku vo webovej poštovej schránke](https://support.office.com/article/775ed31c-05bd-4ee4-b1b3-33fad7b5b992)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-112">To learn more, see [Fix email sync issues or remove a device from your Outlook on the web mailbox](https://support.office.com/article/775ed31c-05bd-4ee4-b1b3-33fad7b5b992)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dacd-113">*Poznámka:* Pripojené kontá už nie sú podporované v Outlooku na webe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-113">*Note:* Connected accounts are no longer supported in Outlook on the web.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dacd-114">Ďalšie informácie nájdete v téme [pripojené kontá už nie sú podporované v Outlooku na webe](https://support.office.com/article/5cc526bf-e928-4a99-8b9f-5e089df7d887) .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dacd-114">To learn more, see [Connected accounts are no longer supported in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5cc526bf-e928-4a99-8b9f-5e089df7d887)</span></span>
